card_name: Rath, Son of the Kutolah Tribe
rules_text:
Reach; flanking
[i]Wolf of Sacae[/i] – As long as Rath is tapped, other creatures you control have flanking.
[i]Crit[/i] – Whenever Rath, Son of the Kutolah Tribe deals combat damage to a player, search your library for a Plains card and put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.
